option.name: NODEBUGLINES Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes line number information from the output object file.

option.name: NODEBUGPUBLICS Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes public symbol information from the output object file.

option.name: NODEBUGSYMBOLS Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes local symbol information from the output object file.

option.name: DISABLEWARNING
option.tip: Disables generation of specified warning numbers.

option.name: BIT Directive
option.tip: Locates BIT segments.

option.name: CODE Directive
option.tip: Locates CODE segments.

option.name: DATA Directive
option.tip: Locates DATA segments.

option.name: IDATA Directive
option.tip: Locates IDATA segments.

option.name: STACK Directive
option.tip: Locates segments in the uppermost IDATA memory space.

option.name: PDATA Directive
option.tip: Locates PDATA segments.

option.name: XDATA Directive
option.tip: Locates XDATA segments.

option.name: RAMSIZE Directive
option.tip: Specifies the number of bytes of DATA and IDATA.

option.name: PRECEDE Directive
option.tip: Locates segments in DATA memory prior to other relocatable BIT, DATA, and IDATA segments.

option.name: BANKAREA
option.tip: Specifies the address range where code banks are located.

option.name: NOAJMP Linker Directive
option.tip: Avoids AJMP instructions in bank switch code.

option.name: NOAMAKE Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes AMAKE information from the object file.

option.name: NODEFAULTLIBRARY Linker Directive
option.tip: Disables automatic inclusion of run-time library routines.

option.name: NOINDIRECTCALL Linker Directive
option.tip: Disables bank switching code for indirectly called functions.

option.name: NOJMPTAB Linker Directive
option.tip: Disables generation of the code banking jump table.

option.name: NOLINES Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes line number information from the listing file and object file.

option.name: NOMAP Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes the memory map from the listing file.

option.name: NOPUBLICS Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes public symbols from the listing file and object file.

option.name: NOSORTSIZE Linker Directive
option.tip: Disables sorting sections by size prior to locating.

option.name: NOSYMBOLS Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes local symbols from the listing file and object file.

option.name: IXREF Linker Directive
option.tip: Enables cross reference details in the listing file.

option.name: RTX51 Linker Directive
option.tip: Specifies that the RTX51 Real-Time Kernel is used.

option.name: RTX51TINY Linker Directive
option.tip: Specifies that the RTX51 Tiny Real-Time Kernel is used.

option.name: SPEEDOVL Linker Directive
option.tip: Ignores references from constant segments to program segments during overlay analysis.

option.name: OVERLAY
option.tip: Modifies the call tree for overlaying of local bit and data segments.

option.name: RECURSIONS
option.tip: Specifies the maximum number of recursive calls detected before link failure.

option.name: PAGELENGTH
option.tip: Specifies the number of lines on a page in the listing file.

option.name: PAGEWIDTH
option.tip: Specifies the number of characters on a line in the listing file.

option.name: REGFILE
option.tip: Specifies the name of the register definition file for global register coloring.

option.name: NODEBUGLINES Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes line number information from the output object file.

option.name: NODEBUGPUBLICS Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes public symbol information from the output object file.

option.name: NODEBUGSYMBOLS Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes local symbol information from the output object file.

option.tip: Disables generation of specified warning numbers.

option.tip: Locates BIT segments.

option.tip: Locates XDATA segments.

option.tip: Specifies the number of bytes of DATA and IDATA.

option.tip: Locates segments in DATA memory prior to other relocatable BIT, DATA, and IDATA segments.

option.name: BANKAREA
option.tip: Specifies the address range where code banks are located.

option.name: NOAJMP Linker Directive
option.tip: Avoids AJMP instructions in bank switch code.

option.name: NOAMAKE Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes AMAKE information from the object file.

option.name: NODEFAULTLIBRARY Linker Directive
option.tip: Disables automatic inclusion of run-time library routines.

option.name: NOINDIRECTCALL Linker Directive
option.tip: Disables bank switching code for indirectly called functions.

option.name: NOJMPTAB Linker Directive
option.tip: Disables generation of the code banking jump table.

option.name: NOLINES Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes line number information from the listing file and object file.

option.name: NOMAP Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes the memory map from the listing file.

option.name: NOPUBLICS Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes public symbols from the listing file and object file.

option.name: NOSORTSIZE Linker Directive
option.tip: Disables sorting sections by size prior to locating.

option.name: NOSYMBOLS Linker Directive
option.tip: Excludes local symbols from the listing file and object file.

option.name: IXREF Linker Directive
option.tip: Enables cross reference details in the listing file.

option.name: RTX51 Linker Directive
option.tip: Specifies that the RTX51 Real-Time Kernel is used.

option.name: RTX51TINY Linker Directive
option.tip: Specifies that the RTX51 Tiny Real-Time Kernel is used.

option.name: SPEEDOVL Linker Directive
option.tip: Ignores references from constant segments to program segments during overlay analysis.

option.name: OVERLAY
option.tip: Modifies the call tree for overlaying of local bit and data segments.

option.name: RECURSIONS
option.tip: Specifies the maximum number of recursive calls detected before link failure.

option.name: PAGELENGTH
option.tip: Specifies the number of lines on a page in the listing file.

option.name: PAGEWIDTH
option.tip: Specifies the number of characters on a line in the listing file.

option.name: REGFILE
option.tip: Specifies the name of the register definition file for global register coloring.

option.name: MACRO Assembler Directive
option.tip: Enables preprocessor expansion of standard macros.

option.name: MPL Assembler Directive
option.tip: Enables preprocessor expansion of MPL macros.

option.name: DEFINE Directive
option.tip: Defines C preprocessor symbols on the command line.

option.name: DEBUG Assembler Directive
option.tip: Includes debugging information in the object file.

option.name: ERRORPRINT Assembler Directive
option.tip: Specifies the file name for error messages.

option.name: SYMBOLS Assembler Directive
option.tip: Includes the symbol table in the listing file.

option.name: SYMLIST Assembler Directive
option.tip: Includes subsequently defined symbols in the symbol table.

option.name: COND Assembler Directive
option.tip: Includes (in the listing file) conditional source lines skipped by the preprocessor.

option.name: GEN Assembler Directive
option.tip: Includes all macro expansions in the listing file.

option.name: LIST Assembler Directive
option.tip: Includes the assembly source text in the listing file.

option.name: NOAMAKE Assembler Directive
option.tip: Excludes build information from the object file.

option.name: MOD_CONT Assembler Directive
option.tip: Enables 24-bit contiguous addressing for Dallas Semiconductor devices.

option.name: MOD_MX51 Assembler Directive
option.tip: Enables instruction set extensions for the NXP 80C51MX architecture.

option.name: MOD51 Assembler Directive
option.tip: Enables code generation and defines SFRs for classic 8051 devices.

option.name: XREF Assembler Directive
option.tip: Includes the cross-reference table in the listing file.

option.name: NOLINES Assembler Directive
option.tip: Excludes line number information from the generated object module.

option.name: DATE Directive
option.tip: Specifies the date to use in the listing file header.

option.name: INCDIR
option.tip: Sets additional include file paths.

option.name: REGISTERBANK
option.tip: Reserves memory space for register banks.

option.name: PAGELENGTH
option.tip: Specifies the number of lines on a page in the listing file.

option.name: PAGEWIDTH
option.tip: Specifies the number of characters on a line in the listing file.

option.name: SET Directive
option.tip: Sets symbols, which may be tested by IF or ELSEIF, to true or a specified value.

option.name: TITLE Directive
option.tip: Specifies the page header title in the listing file.

option.name: ONEREGBANK Compiler Directive
option.tip: Generates code for programs that use only one register bank.

option.name: ORDER Compiler Directive
option.tip: Allocates storage for variables in the order in which they are declared.

option.name: REGPARMS Compiler Directive
option.tip: Enables passing parameter in registers.

option.name: RET_PSTK Compiler Directive
option.tip: Uses the COMPACT model reentrant stack for return addresses.

option.name: RET_XSTK Compiler Directive
option.tip: Uses the LARGE model reentrant stack for return addresses.

option.name: REGISTERBANK
option.tip: Specifies the register bank to use for absolute register accesses.

option.name: Optimization
option.tip: Specifies the level of optimization performed by the compiler.

option.name: Float Fuzzy
option.tip: Sets the number of bits rounded for floating-point comparisons.

option.name: Memory Model
option.tip: Selects the Memory model.

option.name: ROM Directive
option.tip: Specifies the ROM model (SMALL, COMPACT or LARGE).

option.name: WARNINGLEVEL
option.tip: Selects the level of warning detection.

option.name: DEBUG Compiler Directive
option.tip: Includes debugging information in the object file.

option.name: CODE Compiler Directive
option.tip: Includes generated assembly in the listing file.

option.name: SYMBOLS Compiler Directive
option.tip: Includes a symbol list in the listing file.

option.name: SRC Compiler Directive
option.tip: Creates an assembler source file instead of an object file.

option.name: OBJECTEXTEND Compiler Directive
option.tip: Adds additional debugging information to the object file.

option.name: NOAMAKE Compiler Directive
option.tip: Excludes build information from the object file.

option.name: NOPREPROCESS Compiler Directive
option.tip: Disables the C Preprocessor.

option.name: MDU_F120 Compiler Directive
option.tip: The MDU_F120 directive enables support for the Multiple and Accumulate Unit (MAC0) of the Silicon Labs C8051F12x devices.

option.name: MDU_R515 Compiler Directive
option.tip: The MDU_R515 directive enables support for the Multiple/Division Unit (MDU) of the Cast/Evatronix R80515.

option.name: MOD517 Compiler Directive
option.tip: Enables support for additional hardware features of the Infineon 80C517 and compatible devices.

option.name: MODA2 Compiler Directive
option.tip: Enables dual data pointer support for the Atmel 82x8252 and compatible devices.

option.name: MODAB2 Compiler Directive
option.tip: Enables dual data pointer support for the Analog Devices Microconverters (ADuC B2 devices).

option.name: MODC2 Compiler Directive
option.tip: The MODC2 directive enables use of dual data pointers available on the Cast and Evatronix R80515 cores.

option.name: MODDA Compiler Directive
option.tip: Enables arithmetic accelerator support for the Dallas 80C390, 80C400, and 5240.

option.name: MODDP2 Compiler Directive
option.tip: Enables dual data pointer support for the Dallas 320, 520, 530, 550, and compatible devices.

option.name: MODP2 Compiler Directive
option.tip: Disables dual data pointer support for Philips and Atmel devices.

option.name: VARBANKING Compiler Directive
option.tip: Enables far memory type variables.

option.name: STRING Directive
option.tip: Locates implicit string constants to xdata or far memory.

option.name: BSE Compiler Directive
option.tip: This directive may only be used in conjunction with the MOD517 multiple DPTR support.

option.name: BROWSE Compiler Directive
option.tip: Enables source browser information.

option.name: COND Compiler Directive
option.tip: Includes (in the listing file) conditional source lines skipped by the preprocessor.

option.name: EJECT Compiler Directive
option.tip: Inserts a form feed character into the listing file.

option.name: ENUMINT Compiler Directive
option.tip: The ENUMINT directives forces all enumeration symbols to 16-bit int values.

option.name: INTPROMOTE Compiler Directive
option.tip: Enables ANSI integer promotion rules.

option.name: LISTINCLUDE Compiler Directive
option.tip: Adds contents of include files into the listing file.

option.name: NOEXTEND Compiler Directive
option.tip: Disables Cx51 extensions to ANSI C.

option.name: XCROM Compiler Directive
option.tip: Assumes const xdata variables are stored in ROM.

option.name: DEFINE
option.tip: Defines preprocessor names on the command line.

option.name: INCDIR
option.tip: Sets additional include file paths.

option.name: INTVECTOR
option.tip: Specifies the base address for interrupt vectors.

option.name: INTERVAL
option.tip: Specifies the interval to use for interrupt vectors.

option.name: MAXARGS
option.tip: Specifies the maximum size of variable-length argument lists.

option.name: PAGELENGTH
option.tip: Specifies the number of lines on a page in the listing file.

option.name: PAGEWIDTH
option.tip: Specifies the number of characters on a line in the listing file.

option.name: TABS Directive
option.tip: Specifies the tab character expansion width for the listing file.

option.name: ONEREGBANK Compiler Directive
option.tip: Generates code for programs that use only one register bank.

option.name: ORDER Compiler Directive
option.tip: Allocates storage for variables in the order in which they are declared.

option.name: REGPARMS Compiler Directive
option.tip: Enables passing parameter in registers.

option.name: RET_PSTK Compiler Directive
option.tip: Uses the COMPACT model reentrant stack for return addresses.

option.name: RET_XSTK Compiler Directive
option.tip: Uses the LARGE model reentrant stack for return addresses.

option.name: REGISTERBANK
option.tip: Specifies the register bank to use for absolute register accesses.

option.name: Optimization
option.tip: Specifies the level of optimization performed by the compiler.

option.name: Float Fuzzy
option.tip: Sets the number of bits rounded for floating-point comparisons.

option.name: Memory Model
option.tip: Selects the Memory model.

option.name: ROM Directive
option.tip: Specifies the ROM model (SMALL, COMPACT or LARGE).

option.tip: Selects the level of warning detection.

option.tip: Includes debugging information in the object file.

option.tip: Includes generated assembly in the listing file.

option.tip: Includes a symbol list in the listing file.

option.tip: Creates an assembler source file instead of an object file.

option.tip: Adds additional debugging information to the object file.

option.tip: Excludes build information from the object file.

option.tip: Disables the C Preprocessor.
